00100 
00101 /* Scene Parameters */
00102 
00103 class SceneParams {
00104 public:
00105     enum { OSL, SVM } shadingsystem;
00106     enum BVHType { BVH_DYNAMIC, BVH_STATIC } bvh_type;
00107     bool use_bvh_cache;
00108     bool use_bvh_spatial_split;
00109     bool use_qbvh;
00110 
00111     SceneParams()
00112     {
00113         shadingsystem = SVM;
00114         bvh_type = BVH_DYNAMIC;
00115         use_bvh_cache = false;
00116         use_bvh_spatial_split = false;
00117 #ifdef __QBVH__
00118         use_qbvh = true;
00119 #else
00120         use_qbvh = false;
00121 #endif
00122     }
00123 
00124     bool modified(const SceneParams& params)
00125     { return !(shadingsystem == params.shadingsystem
00126         && bvh_type == params.bvh_type
00127         && use_bvh_cache == params.use_bvh_cache
00128         && use_bvh_spatial_split == params.use_bvh_spatial_split
00129         && use_qbvh == params.use_qbvh); }
00130 };

00133 
00134 class Scene {
00135 public:
00136     /* data */
00137     Camera *camera;
00138     Filter *filter;
00139     Film *film;
00140     Background *background;
00141     Integrator *integrator;
00142 
00143     /* data lists */
00144     vector<Object*> objects;
00145     vector<Mesh*> meshes;
00146     vector<Shader*> shaders;
00147     vector<Light*> lights;
00148 
00149     /* data managers */
00150     ImageManager *image_manager;
00151     LightManager *light_manager;
00152     ShaderManager *shader_manager;
00153     MeshManager *mesh_manager;
00154     ObjectManager *object_manager;
00155 
00156     /* default shaders */
00157     int default_surface;
00158     int default_light;
00159     int default_background;
00160     int default_holdout;
00161     int default_empty;
00162 
00163     /* device */
00164     Device *device;
00165     DeviceScene dscene;
00166 
00167     /* parameters */
00168     SceneParams params;
00169 
00170     /* mutex must be locked manually by callers */
00171     thread_mutex mutex;
00172 
00173     Scene(const SceneParams& params);
00174     ~Scene();
00175 
00176     void device_update(Device *device, Progress& progress);
00177 
00178     bool need_update();
00179     bool need_reset();
00180 };
